---
 layout: post
 title: 三维空间随机旋转
 categories:
 - 科
 tags:
 - 数理
 chem: true
---

- 2018-10-07 22:23:47

生成分子初始构型的时候, 经常需要对分子进行随机旋转. 这并不是一个困难的工作, 因为早就有成熟的方法了. 在这里我展示几种不同的实现方法, 供参考.

下面是四种不同方法分别得到的球面上的随机点

### Marsaglia方法

<figure><script>var Mol1=new ChemDoodle.TransformCanvas3D('Mol-1',642,396);Mol1.specs.shapes_color='#fff';Mol1.specs.backgroundColor='black';Mol1.specs.set3DRepresentation('Ball and Stick');Mol1.specs.projectionPerspective_3D=false;Mol1.specs.compass_display=true;
/*//Mol1.specs.atoms_resolution_3D=15;
//Mol1.specs.bonds_resolution_3D=15;
//Mol1.specs.crystals_unitCellLineWidth=1.5;*/
Mol1.nextFrame=function(delta){var matrix=[];ChemDoodle.lib.mat4.identity(matrix);var change=delta*Math.PI/15000;ChemDoodle.lib.mat4.rotate(matrix,change,[1,0,0]);ChemDoodle.lib.mat4.rotate(matrix,change,[0,1,0]);ChemDoodle.lib.mat4.rotate(matrix,change,[0,0,1]);ChemDoodle.lib.mat4.multiply(this.rotationMatrix, matrix)};
Mol1.startAnimation=ChemDoodle._AnimatorCanvas.prototype.startAnimation;Mol1.stopAnimation=ChemDoodle._AnimatorCanvas.prototype.stopAnimation;Mol1.isRunning=ChemDoodle._AnimatorCanvas.prototype.isRunning;Mol1.dblclick=ChemDoodle.RotatorCanvas.prototype.dblclick;Mol1.timeout=5;Mol1.handle=null;

### 四元数方法: 生成随机的单位四元数

<span style="color: #666666">}</span>

<span style="color: #666666">{</span>	<span style="color: #B8860B">Natm</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span><span style="color: #B8860B">$1</span>; getline
	<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">for</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span><span style="color: #B8860B">i</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>1; i&lt;<span style="color: #666666">=</span>Natm; i++<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> getline; Satm<span style="color: #666666">[</span>i<span style="color: #666666">]=</span><span style="color: #B8860B">$1</span>; Xatm<span style="color: #666666">[</span>i<span style="color: #666666">]=</span><span style="color: #B8860B">$2</span>; Yatm<span style="color: #666666">[</span>i<span style="color: #666666">]=</span><span style="color: #B8860B">$3</span>; Zatm<span style="color: #666666">[</span>i<span style="color: #666666">]=</span><span style="color: #B8860B">$4</span> <span style="color: #666666">}</span>

	print Nmax*Natm<span style="color: #BB4444">&quot;\nRot. Method: &quot;</span>method
	<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">for</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span><span style="color: #B8860B">n</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>1; n&lt;<span style="color: #666666">=</span>Nmax; n++<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">isang</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>getAxi<span style="color: #666666">(</span>method, axi, n, Nmax<span style="color: #666666">)</span>

		<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span>isang<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span>
			<span style="color: #B8860B">tht</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>Pi
			<span style="color: #B8860B">x</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>.5*axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
			<span style="color: #B8860B">y</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>.5*axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
			<span style="color: #B8860B">z</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>.5*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]</span>+1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		<span style="color: #666666">}</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">else</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span>
			<span style="color: #B8860B">tht</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>0<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
			<span style="color: #B8860B">x</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
			<span style="color: #B8860B">y</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
			<span style="color: #B8860B">z</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
		<span style="color: #666666">}</span>

		AxiRotMat<span style="color: #666666">(</span>isang, tht, x, y, z<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">for</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span><span style="color: #B8860B">i</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>1; i&lt;<span style="color: #666666">=</span>Natm; i++<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span>
			V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>Xatm<span style="color: #666666">[</span>i<span style="color: #666666">]</span>; V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>Yatm<span style="color: #666666">[</span>i<span style="color: #666666">]</span>; V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>Zatm<span style="color: #666666">[</span>i<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
			RotVect<span style="color: #666666">(</span>RotMat, V<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
			<span style="color: #AA22FF">printf</span> <span style="color: #BB4444">&quot;%s %9.6f %9.6f %9.6f\n&quot;</span>, Satm<span style="color: #666666">[</span>i<span style="color: #666666">]</span>, V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]</span>, V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]</span>, V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
		<span style="color: #666666">}</span>
	<span style="color: #666666">}</span>
	<span style="color: #AA22FF">exit</span>
<span style="color: #666666">}</span>

<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">function</span> acos<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">return</span> atan2<span style="color: #666666">(</span>sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>1-x*x<span style="color: #666666">)</span>,x<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">}</span>

<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">function</span> getAxi<span style="color: #666666">(</span>method, axi, Ipnt, Npnt,  i,r1,r2,tht1,tht2<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span>
	<span style="color: #B8860B">isang</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>1; ;axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>0<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>0
	<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span><span style="color: #B8860B">method</span><span style="color: #666666">==</span>1<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># Marsaglia Method</span>
		<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">while</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span>1<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span>
			<span style="color: #B8860B">r1</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>2*rand<span style="color: #666666">()</span>-1
			<span style="color: #B8860B">r2</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>2*rand<span style="color: #666666">()</span>-1
			<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span>r1*r1+r2*r2&lt;1<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF">break</span>
		<span style="color: #666666">}</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">tht1</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>r1*r1+r2*r2
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>2*r1*sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>1-tht1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>2*r2*sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>1-tht1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>1-2*tht1
	<span style="color: #666666">}</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">else</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span><span style="color: #B8860B">method</span><span style="color: #666666">==</span>2<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span>    <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># theta distributuion Method</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">tht1</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>acos<span style="color: #666666">(</span>2*rand<span style="color: #666666">()</span>-1<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># tht1=rand()*Pi # can NOT use</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">tht2</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>rand<span style="color: #666666">()</span>*TwoPi
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>sin<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>*cos<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht2<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>sin<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>*sin<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht2<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>cos<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
	<span style="color: #666666">}</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">else</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span><span style="color: #B8860B">method</span><span style="color: #666666">==</span>3<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> <span style="color: #B8860B">isang</span><span style="color: #666666">=0</span> <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># 四元数方法</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">tht1</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>rand<span style="color: #666666">()</span>*TwoPi
		<span style="color: #B8860B">tht2</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>rand<span style="color: #666666">()</span>*TwoPi
		<span style="color: #B8860B">r1</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>1-rand<span style="color: #666666">())</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">r2</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>1-r1*r1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>0<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>sin<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>*r1
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>cos<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>*r1
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>sin<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht2<span style="color: #666666">)</span>*r2
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>cos<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht2<span style="color: #666666">)</span>*r2
	<span style="color: #666666">}</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">else</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span><span style="color: #B8860B">method</span><span style="color: #666666">==</span>4<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># Sprial Method, for regular equidistributed</span>
		Ipnt--
		<span style="color: #B8860B">r1</span>   <span style="color: #666666">=</span> -1+2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>Ipnt+0.5<span style="color: #666666">)</span>/Npnt <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># +0.5 表示在厚度的中点处取点</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">tht2</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> Pi*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>5<span style="color: #666666">)</span>-1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>*Ipnt
		<span style="color: #B8860B">r2</span>   <span style="color: #666666">=</span> sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>1-r1*r1<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> r2*cos<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht2<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> r2*sin<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht2<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		axi<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> r1
	<span style="color: #666666">}</span>
	<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">return</span> isang
<span style="color: #666666">}</span>

<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">function</span> RotVect<span style="color: #666666">(</span>RotMat, V<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># 按照矩阵RotMat旋转矢量V</span>
	<span style="color: #B8860B">Vx</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]</span>; <span style="color: #B8860B">Vy</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]</span>; <span style="color: #B8860B">Vz</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]</span>
	V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span> RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1,1<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vx + RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1,2<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vy + RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1,3<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vz
	V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span> RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2,1<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vx + RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2,2<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vy + RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2,3<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vz
	V<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span> RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3,1<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vx + RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3,2<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vy + RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3,3<span style="color: #666666">]</span>*Vz
<span style="color: #666666">}</span>

<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">function</span> AxiRotMat<span style="color: #666666">(</span>isang, tht, x, y, z,   w,rsq<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># 绕矢量(x,y,z)旋转tht弧度，四元数方法</span>
	<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span>isang<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># w 为角度, 使用 轴-角 计算旋转矩阵</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">w</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>cos<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht/2<span style="color: #666666">)</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">rsq</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*x+y*y+z*z<span style="color: #666666">)</span>; <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span>rsq&gt;0<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #B8860B">rsq</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> sin<span style="color: #666666">(</span>tht/2<span style="color: #666666">)</span>/rsq
		x *<span style="color: #666666">=</span> rsq; y *<span style="color: #666666">=</span> rsq; z *<span style="color: #666666">=</span> rsq
	<span style="color: #666666">}</span> <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">else</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span>    <span style="color: #008800; font-style: italic"># 否则直接使用传入的四元数构建</span>
		<span style="color: #B8860B">w</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>tht
		<span style="color: #B8860B">rsq</span><span style="color: #666666">=</span>sqrt<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*x+y*y+z*z+w*w<span style="color: #666666">)</span>; <span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span>rsq&gt;0<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #B8860B">rsq</span> <span style="color: #666666">=</span> 1/rsq
		x *<span style="color: #666666">=</span> rsq; y *<span style="color: #666666">=</span> rsq; z *<span style="color: #666666">=</span> rsq; w *<span style="color: #666666">=</span> rsq
	<span style="color: #666666">}</span>
	RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1,1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span> 1-2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>y*y+z*z<span style="color: #666666">)</span>; RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1,2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>   2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*y-w*z<span style="color: #666666">)</span>; RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1,3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>   2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*z+w*y<span style="color: #666666">)</span>;
	RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2,1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>   2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*y+w*z<span style="color: #666666">)</span>; RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2,2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span> 1-2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*x+z*z<span style="color: #666666">)</span>; RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2,3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>   2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>y*z-w*x<span style="color: #666666">)</span>;
	RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3,1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>   2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*z-w*y<span style="color: #666666">)</span>; RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3,2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>   2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>y*z+w*x<span style="color: #666666">)</span>; RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3,3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span> 1-2*<span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*x+y*y<span style="color: #666666">)</span>;
	<span style="color: #AA22FF; font-weight: bold">if</span><span style="color: #666666">(</span>x*x+y*y+z*z+w*w<span style="color: #666666">==</span>0<span style="color: #666666">)</span> <span style="color: #666666">{</span> RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>1,1<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>-1; RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>2,2<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>-1; RotMat<span style="color: #666666">[</span>3,3<span style="color: #666666">]=</span>-1 <span style="color: #666666">}</span>
<span style="color: #666666">}</span>
<span style="color: #BB4444">&#39;</span></pre></div>
</td></tr></table>
